It converts the raw Autonomous System (AS) graph produced by the call graph generator into a clean, dictionary-based structure suitable for higher-level consumption.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"e8672e61-1de6-46e6-8433-1ea320558558","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"115dca83-04a4-43d3-b692-ebecf0fa1c57","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Role Within AsGraph","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"a904399a-93d2-4837-801e-ed977b466073","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Within the context of the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"AsGraph","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" formatter, ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"generate","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" acts as the final transformation step between internal graph representations and external consumers. It abstracts away implementation details of the call graph and exposes only the essential relationships in a predictable format.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"26e0f84c-a17a-47bc-8442-f505706102a0","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"7a9dab67-6fdd-43e1-b1ed-87cd1c4a717d","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Behavior","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"624652c6-52c8-4a00-a315-e22fe5950d0f","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The function retrieves the AS graph from the associated call graph generator and iterates over each graph entry.
